reviewText: I was waxed by Grace for a Brazilian several years ago at her studio in Denver. She is a true professional and an amazingly skilled esthetician. Since I live in a remote area where nobody is licensed to perform body waxing, I have resorted to trying to wax myself at home. I have tried using an at-home kit with mixed results. With this DVD, Grace has put a remarkable amount of effort into an informative and professional video. The techniques that she demonstrates on herself (!) and her tips for self-waxing are great and cannot be found anywhere else. The video shows a full Brazilian wax and is obviously for adults only. She also has a website where you can get answers to your questions. Thank you for such a great demonstration, Grace!
